column1: Table D1.18.1: Selected family and culture characteristics, by age group, Indigenous persons (15 years and over), 2018–19
Whether individual and/or relatives ever removed from family (total removed)
Individual has been removed with or without relative(s)
Neither individual nor relative(s) removed from family
Ratio neither individual nor relative removed/individual and/or relative removed
Identifies with tribal/language group or clan(d)(e)
Recognises an areas as homelands/traditional country(f)
Whether had unfair treatment in last 12 months because Aboriginal and/or Torres Strait Islander(g)
(a) Distribution of total Indigenous population (15 year and over).
(d) Includes respondents who identified with tribal group, language group, a clan, a mission, or an Aboriginal/Torres Strait Islander regional group.
Note: Cells in this table have been randomly adjusted to avoid the release of confidential data. Discrepancies may occur between sums of the component items and totals.
Source: AIHW and ABS analysis of National Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Health Survey 2018–19.
